# File lib/midilib/io/midifile.rb, line 391
    def read_var_len
        @raw_var_num_data = []
        c = getc()
        @raw_var_num_data << c
        val = c
        if (val & 0x80).nonzero?
            val &= 0x7f
            while true
                c = getc()
                @raw_var_num_data << c
                val = (val << 7) + (c & 0x7f)
                break if (c & 0x80).zero?
            end
        end
        return val
    end
